notes.days: Time window in days (999999 = all time when useTimeWeighting=true)
notes.max: Maximum number of training samples to generate
notes.useTimeWeighting: Enable exponential time decay (recent memories weighted higher)
notes.decayHalfLife: Days until a memory's weight is halved. Examples:
notes.requireProcessed: Only include memories processed by organizer agent (false = include all)
notes.requireTagsOrEntities: Only include memories with tags or entities (false = include all)
notes.allowedTypes: Memory types to include in training data
